## What is it?
Book copier is a Minecraft plugin for Bukkit API. It's completely open-source. You can browse, download and integrate my code to your project.

## Features
With BookCopier is administration of writable books much easier! You can copy or send books to target user and backup them to files. You can naturally load them back. 

### How to save book to file
It's simpe. Only type /bc save <fileName> when you're holding writable book. File with backup will be saved to _plugins/BookCopier/fileName.book_

### How to load book from file
Type /bc load <fileName>. File named "fileName" must be in directory _plugins/BookCopier_.

### How to edit or create .book files
.book format is standart .txt only different named. You can open it in Notepad or Notepad++. If you wont to create it you must abide few rules.
This is conception of file:
```
title: default
author: default
pages: page1,page2
```
Pages are separated by comma. Maximum are 20 pages (limited by MC).

## Commands
_<> - required arguments_
_[] - optional arguments_

```
/bc help - Shows commands and info about plugin.
/bc copy [value] - Copies book in your hand.
/bc give <player> [value] - Gives book in your hand target player.
/bc load <fileName> - Loads book from file to your inventory.
/bc save <fileName> - Saves book in your hand to file.
```
## Upcoming features
"First login book" - When player joins server for first time, plugin gives him book what you specified in file automaticaly!

## About author
I'm Richard, 16 years old programmer. I own Minecraft server...come and try: [here](http://mineandcraft.cz/)
